title: sundhari nannandharilO
sahitya:
sundari nannandarilO jUci brOvavamma tripura

anupallavi

 sandaDiyani indumukhi jAlamu vaddamma tripura

caraNam 1

 bAlE patita sura bAlE gamana jita marAlE sva-krtAkhila lIlE 
tilakAnkita phAlE nI bhaktiyu mElE nI daya rAdEla talli tripura
   
caraNam 2

 vANi vinutE shukapANi vara shESa vENi lalitE kalyANi 
sAmbashivuni rANi mAdhrya vANi nammiti pubONi talli tripura
   
caraNam 3

 vArIsha stuta gambhIri Adipura vihAri dIna janAdhAri 
nAgarAja kumAri duSkarma vidAri tyAgarAju kOriyunna tripura
